book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲉϥⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲡⲣⲟⲥⲫⲟⲣⲁ: ⲡⲉⲧϯ ⲛ̅ϩⲧⲏϥ ⲉⲛ̅ⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲧϯ ⲑⲩⲥⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϫⲁⲓ̈.
English: He that keepeth the law bringeth offerings enough: he that taketh heed to the commandment offereth a peace offering.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧϯ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲙⲟⲧ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲧ.... ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲁⲙⲓⲧ ⲡⲉⲧϯ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲁ ⲡⲉⲧⲑⲩⲥⲓⲁⲍⲓ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲙⲟⲩ.
English: He that requiteth a good turn offereth fine flour; and he that giveth alms sacrificeth praise.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉ ⲥⲁϩⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲧⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϥⲕⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲡⲉ ⲥⲁϩⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅.
English: To depart from wickedness is a thing pleasing to the Lord; and to forsake unrighteousness is a propitiation.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉⲕϣⲟⲩⲉⲓⲧ: ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ.
English: Thou shalt not appear empty before the Lord. (5) For all these things are to be done because of the commandment.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲡⲣⲟⲥⲫⲟⲣⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲇⲓⲕⲁⲓⲟⲥ ϯ ⲕⲛ̅ⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲑⲩⲥⲓⲁⲥⲧⲏⲣⲓⲟⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲥⲥϯⲛⲟⲩϥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ.
English: The offering of the righteous maketh the altar fat, and the sweet savour thereof is before the most High.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲉⲑⲩⲥⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲇⲓⲕⲁⲓⲟⲥ ϣⲏⲡ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲡⲱⲃϣ̅ ⲁⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ.
English: The sacrifice of a just man is acceptable. and the memorial thereof shall never be forgotten.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲃⲁⲗ ⲛ̅ⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲥ̅ⲃⲕⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲁⲡⲁⲣⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϭⲓϫ.
English: Give the Lord his honour with a good eye, and diminish not the firstfruits of thine hands.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯ ⲟⲩⲣⲟⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕϩⲟ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϯ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲣⲉⲙⲏⲧ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ.
English: In all thy gifts shew a cheerful countenance, and dedicate thy tithes with gladness.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉϥϯ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲕⲛⲁϭⲛ̅ⲧϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϭⲓϫ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲃⲁⲗ ⲛ̅ⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲥ.
English: Give unto the most High according as he hath enriched thee; and as thou hast gotten, give with a cheerful eye.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲉϥⲧⲱⲱⲃⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ⲧⲱⲱⲃⲉ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁϣϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲕⲱⲃ.
English: For the Lord recompenseth, and will give thee seven times as much.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲟⲩⲕⲣⲓⲧⲏⲥ ⲡⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲁϥ.
English: Do not think to corrupt with gifts; for such he will not receive: and trust not to unrighteous sacrifices; for the Lord is judge, and with him is no respect of persons.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲉϥϫⲓϩⲟ ϩⲓ ϩⲏⲕⲉ ϥⲛⲁⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲡⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲏⲩ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅.
English: He will not accept any person against a poor man, but will hear the prayer of the oppressed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲟⲃϣϥ ⲉⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲣⲫⲁⲛⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲭⲏⲣⲁ ⲉⲥϣⲁⲛϫⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥϣⲁϫⲉ.
English: He will not despise the supplication of the fatherless; nor the widow, when she poureth out her complaint.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲏ ⲙⲉⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲉⲓⲏ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲭⲏⲣⲁ ⲉⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲥⲟⲩⲟⲟϭⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲥⲁϣⲕⲁⲕ ⲛ̅ⲛⲏⲩ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲩ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈;
English: Do not the tears run down the widow’s cheeks? and is not her cry against him that causeth them to fall?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲩⲛⲁϫⲓ ⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲉϩⲛⲁϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅ ⲛⲁⲡⲱϩ ϣⲁ ⲛⲉⲕⲗⲟⲟⲗⲉ.
English: He that serveth the Lord shall be accepted with favour, and his prayer shall reach unto the clouds.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲉϣⲗⲏⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲑⲃ̅ⲃⲓⲏⲩ ϫⲉⲧ ⲛⲉⲕⲗⲟⲟⲗⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲩⲥⲉⲡⲥⲱⲡϥ̅ ⲉⲙⲡϥ̅ϩⲱⲛ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ
English: The prayer of the humble pierceth the clouds: and till it come nigh, he will not be comforted;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥⲥⲁϩⲱϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉⲙⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ϭⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϥⲛⲁⲕⲣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲇⲓⲕⲁⲓⲟⲥ ⲛϥ̅ⲣ̅ ⲡⲉⲩϩⲁⲡ.
English: and will not depart, till the most High shall behold to judge righteously, and execute judgment.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲱⲥⲕ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϩⲟⲣϣ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ ϣⲁⲛⲧϥ̅ⲟⲩⲱϣϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϯⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲁⲧⲛⲁ.
English: For the Lord will not be slack, neither will the Mighty be patient toward them, till he have smitten in sunder the loins of the unmerciful,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ⲧⲱⲱⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲃⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ϣⲁⲛⲧϥ̅ϥⲓ ⲛ̅ⲙ̅ⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥϣ...
English: and repayed vengeance to the heathen; till he have taken away the multitude of the proud, and broken the sceptre of the unrighteous;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ⲟⲩⲱϣϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϭⲣⲏⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅. ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲛⲉⲩⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ
English: Till he have rendered to every man according to his deeds, and to the works of men according to their devices;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲛⲧϥ̅ⲕⲣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲣⲓⲥⲓⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ⲉⲩⲫⲣⲁⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲛⲁ.
English: till he have judged the cause of his people, and made them to rejoice in his mercy.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲛⲉⲥⲉ ⲡⲛⲁ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲑⲗⲓⲯⲓⲥ: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲗⲟⲟⲗⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲉⲙⲛ̅ϩⲱⲟⲩ.
English: Mercy is seasonable in the time of affliction, as clouds of rain in the time of drought.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁ ⲛⲁⲛ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲛⲅ̅ϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉϫⲱⲛ.
English: Have mercy upon us, O Lord God of all, and behold us:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲅ̅ⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕϩⲟⲧⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲛⲅ̅ϥⲓ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕϭⲓϫ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ϣⲙ̅ⲙⲟ.
English: And send thy fear upon all the nations that seek not after thee. (3) Lift up thy hand against the strange nations,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲁⲣⲟⲩⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲧⲉⲕϭⲟⲙ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲉⲛⲧⲁⲕⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲉⲕⲉⲁⲓ̈ⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲛⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: and let them see thy power. (4) As thou wast sanctified in us before them: so be thou magnified among them before us.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲁⲣⲟⲩⲥⲟⲩⲱⲛⲅ̅ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲑⲉ ⲉⲛⲧⲁⲛⲥⲟⲩⲱⲛⲅ̅ ϫⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲃ̅ⲃⲗ̅ⲗⲁⲕ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: And let them know thee, as we have known thee, that there is no God but only thou, O God.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓ ϩⲛ̅ⲙⲁⲉⲓⲛ ⲛ̅ⲃⲣ̅ⲣⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ϣⲓⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ.
English: Shew new signs, and make other strange wonders:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲁⲧⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲉⲥ ⲡⲉⲕϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲛⲅ̅ⲡⲱϩⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲟⲩⲃⲏⲕ ⲛⲅ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲥϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲁϫⲉ.
English: glorify thy hand and thy right arm, that they may set forth thy wondrous works.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ..... ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛⲅ̅ⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲧⲱϣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲁⲣⲟⲩϫⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲛ̅ⲕⲱϩⲧ̅.
English: Raise up indignation, and pour out wrath: take away the adversary, and destroy the enemy. (8) Sake the time short, remember the covenant, and let them declare thy wonderful works.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲁⲣⲉ ⲛⲉⲧⲑⲙ̅ⲕⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲙⲁⲣⲟⲩⲟⲩⲱⲙ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲛϥ̅ⲛⲁⲟⲩϫⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲛ.
English: Let him that escapeth be consumed by the rage of the fire; and let them perish that oppress the people.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲱϣϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲁⲣⲭⲱⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲁϫⲉ ⲛⲉⲧϫⲱ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ⲃⲗ̅ⲗⲁⲛ.
English: Smite in sunder the heads of the rulers of the heathen, that say, There is none other but we.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲱⲟⲩϩ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲛⲉⲫⲩⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲁⲕⲱⲃ.
English: Gather all the tribes of Jacob together, and inherit thou them, as from the beginning.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϩⲏⲧ ⲉϥⲣⲟⲟⲩⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϥⲙⲟⲧⲛ̅ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ϭⲓⲛⲟⲩⲟⲟⲙ ⲉϥⲛⲁϥⲓ ⲡⲣⲟⲟⲩϣ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϭⲓⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲙ.
English: A cheerful and good heart will have a care of his meat and diet.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲟⲩϣⲏ ⲛ̅ⲣⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ⲃⲱⲗ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲣⲟⲟⲩϣ ⲥⲁϩⲉ ⲫⲓⲛⲏⲃ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ.
English: Watching for riches consumeth the flesh, and the care thereof driveth away sleep.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲣⲟⲟⲩϣ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲩϣⲏ ⲛ̅ⲣⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲡⲁⲓⲧⲓ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲉⲕⲣⲓⲕⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩϩⲓⲛⲏⲃ ⲧⲁⲗϭⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲱⲛⲉ ⲉϥⲛⲁϣⲧ̅.
English: Watching care will not let a man slumber, as a sore disease breaketh sleep,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ϩⲓⲥⲉ ⲉϥⲥⲱⲟⲩϩ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲭⲣⲏⲙⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁϥⲥⲉⲓ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲧⲣⲩⲫⲏ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲟⲧⲛⲉⲥ.
English: The rich hath great labour in gathering riches together; and when he resteth, he is filled with his delicates.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲫⲏⲕⲉ ϩⲓⲥⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡϣⲱⲱⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲁϩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁϥⲣ̅ϭⲣⲱϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲟⲧⲛⲉⲥ.
English: The poor laboureth in his poor estate; and when he leaveth off, he is still needy.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲛⲟⲩⲃ ϥⲛⲁⲧⲙⲁⲓ̈ⲟ ⲁⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲡⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ ⲛⲁⲙⲟⲩϩ ... ⲉⲩⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲛⲁϥ.
English: He that loveth gold shall not be justified, and he that followeth corruption shall have enough thereof.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ϩⲁϩ ⲅⲁⲣ ϩⲉ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲡⲉⲩⲧⲁⲕⲟ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: Gold hath been the ruin of many, and their destruction was present.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϣⲉ ⲛ̅ϫⲣⲟⲡ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲧϣⲙ̅ϣⲉ ⲛⲁϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲛⲁⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅.
English: It is a stumblingblock unto them that sacrifice unto it, and every fool shall be taken therewith.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲓ̈ⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩϩⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲉϥⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲟⲩⲁϩϥ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲟⲩⲛⲟⲩⲃ.
English: Blessed is the rich that is found without blemish, and hath not gone after gold.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉ; ⲧⲁⲣⲛ̅ⲙⲁⲕⲁⲣⲓⲍⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ: ⲁϥⲣ̅ ϩⲛ̅ϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ.
English: Who is he? and we will call him blessed: for wonderful things hath he done among his people.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩⲇⲟⲕⲓⲙⲁⲍⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲁϥϫⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲧⲁⲣⲉϥϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲩϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ.
English: Who hath been tried thereby, and found perfect? then let him glory.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ϣϭⲟⲙ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲉⲡⲁⲣⲁⲃⲁ ⲉⲙⲡϥ̅ⲡⲁⲣⲁⲃⲁ; ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲣⲡⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲙⲡϥ̅ⲉⲓⲣⲉ;
English: Who might offend, and hath not offended? or done evil, and hath not done it?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲉϥⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲛ ⲛⲁⲧⲁϫⲣⲟ ⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲉⲕⲕⲗⲏⲥⲓⲁ ⲛⲁϫⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲁ.
English: His goods shall be established, and the congregation shall declare his alms.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛϩⲙⲟⲟⲥ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲁⲡⲉⲍⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲏⲛ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲕ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲟⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ϩⲁϩ ϩⲓⲱⲱⲥ.
English: If thou sit at a bountiful table, be not greedy upon it, and say not, There is much meat on it.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ..... ϫⲉ ⲡⲃⲁⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲟⲥ ϩⲟⲟⲩ: [ⲁⲩ]ⲱ ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉⲧⲥⲟⲛⲧ̅ ⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲃⲁⲗ;
English: Remember that a wicked eye is an evil thing: and what is created more wicked than an eye? therefore it weepeth upon every occasion.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ...ⲣⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲥⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲧⲟⲟⲧⲕ̅ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϩⲉϫϫ ⲧⲉⲕϭⲓϫ ⲉⲧϫⲏ ⲛⲉⲙⲁϥ.
English: Stretch not thine hand whithersoever it looketh, and thrust it not with him into the dish. (15) Judge not thy neighbour by thyself:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲉⲕⲙⲟⲩⲕⲕ̅ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ϩⲱⲃ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: and be discreet in every point.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲱⲙ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϩⲁⲣⲟⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲁⲡⲧ̅ ⲣⲱⲕ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲙⲉⲥⲧⲱⲕ.
English: Eat as it becometh a man, those things which are set before thee; and devour note, lest thou be hated.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲥⲃⲱ ⲕⲁ ⲧⲟⲟⲧⲕ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲁⲧⲥⲉⲓ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ϫⲱⲣⲡ̅.
English: Leave off first for manners’ sake; and be not unsatiable, lest thou offend.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛϩⲙⲟⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲥⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲧⲟⲟⲧⲕ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲁ ⲧⲉⲩϩⲏ.
English: When thou sittest among many, reach not thine hand out first of all.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲡⲣⲱϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉϥⲧⲥⲁⲃⲏⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲉϥϫⲗ̅ϩⲏⲥ ⲡⲉ ϩⲓ ⲡⲉϥϭⲗⲟϭ.
English: A very little is sufficient for a man well nurtured, and he fetcheth not his wind short upon his bed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲕⲱⲃϣ̅ ⲉⲕⲙⲟⲧⲛ̅ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛⲣ̅ ⲡⲣⲱϣⲉ: ϣⲁⲕⲧⲱⲟⲩⲛ ⲉϩⲧⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ.
English: Sound sleep cometh of moderate eating: he riseth early, and his wits are with him:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲙ̅ⲕⲁϩ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲏ ⲛ̅ⲣⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲭⲟⲗⲏ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲧⲥⲉⲓ.
English: but the pain of watching, and choler, and pangs of the belly, are with an unsatiable man.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲁⲕϫⲓ ..ϭⲓⲛⲟⲩⲱⲙ ⲧⲱⲟⲩⲛ ⲛⲅ̅ⲕⲁ ⲃⲟⲗ ⲛⲅ̅ⲙ̅ⲧⲟⲛ ....
English: And if thou hast been forced to eat, arise, go forth, vomit, and thou shalt have rest.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲱⲧⲙ ⲉⲣⲟⲓ̈ ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ⲥⲟϣ .... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲕⲛⲁϩⲉ ⲉⲛⲁϣⲁϫⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲑⲁⲏ ⲡⲉ.
English: My son, hear me, and despise me not, and at the last thou shalt find as I told thee:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲕⲛⲁϣⲧ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϣⲁϫⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ϣⲱⲛⲉ ⲛⲁⲧⲱⲙⲛ̅ⲧ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲡⲉ.
English: in all thy works be quick, so shall there no sickness come unto thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲛⲉⲥⲡⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲉⲧⲣⲟⲟⲩⲧ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲟⲉⲓⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲁⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲧ.
English: Whoso is liberal of his meat, men shall speak well of him; and the report of his good housekeeping will be believed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ⲕⲣⲙ̅ⲣⲙ̅ ⲉⲩⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲟⲥ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲟⲉⲓⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ ⲟⲣϫ̅.
English: But against him that is a niggard of his meat the whole city shall murmur; and the testimonies of his niggardness shall not be doubted of.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲥⲁⲩⲏⲣⲡ̅: ⲁ ⲏⲣⲡ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲧⲁⲕⲉ ϩⲁϩ.
English: Shew not thy valiantness in wine; for wine hath destroyed many.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁϣ ⲡⲉ ϣⲁϥⲇⲟⲕⲓⲙⲁⲍⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲓ̈ⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲟϣⲙⲉϥ: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲏⲣⲡ̅ ⲉϣⲁϥⲇⲟⲕⲓⲙⲁⲍⲉ ⲙ̅ⲫⲏⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲁⲥⲓϩⲏⲧ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲙⲓϣⲉ.
English: The furnace proveth the edge by dipping: so doth wine the hearts of the proud by drunkenness.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲙ̅ⲧⲟⲛ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲏⲣⲡ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲁϩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛⲥⲟⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲱϣⲉ: ⲁϣ ⲧⲉ ⲧⲙⲟⲧⲛⲉⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲛϥ̅ⲥⲉ ⲏⲣⲡ̅ ⲁⲛ; ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩⲥⲟⲛⲧϥ̅ ⲉⲩⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ ⲛ̅ⲣ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ.
English: Wine is as good as life to a man, if it be drunk moderately: what life is then to a man that is without wine? for it was made to make men glad.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲧⲉⲗⲏⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲏⲣⲡ̅ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛⲥⲟⲟϥ. .... ⲣⲱϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ.
English: Wine measurably drunk and in season bringeth gladness of the heart, and cheerfulness of the mind:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ... ϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲡⲉ ⲥⲉ ⲟⲩⲏⲣⲡ̅ ⲉⲛⲁϣⲱϥ.
English: But wine drunken with excess maketh bitterness of the mind, with brawling and quarrelling.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡϯϩⲉ ⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲡϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲉⲩϫⲣⲟⲡ ⲛⲁϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϫⲟⲕϫⲕ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲧⲟⲡ ⲉϥⲧⲥ̅ⲃⲕⲟ ⲛ̅ⲧϭⲟⲙ ⲉϥⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲡⲱⲗϩ̅.
English: Drunkenness increaseth the rage of a fool till he offend: it diminisheth strength, and maketh wounds.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲡⲓⲉ ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲏⲣⲡ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲥⲟϣϥϥ̅ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ.
English: Rebuke not thy neighbour at the wine, and despise him not in his mirth:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲓ ⲟⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭⲛⲉϭ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲑⲗⲓⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲉϣⲁⲧϥ̅.
English: give him no despiteful words, and press not upon him with urging him to drink.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲁⲁⲕ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ ⲉⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲉϫⲱϥ: ⲁⲣⲓ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲁ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲛⲅ̅ϥⲓ ⲡⲉⲩⲣⲟⲟⲩϣ ⲛⲅ̅ϩⲙⲟⲟⲥ.
English: If thou be made the master of a feast, lift not thyself up, but be among them as one of the rest; take diligent care for them, and so sit down.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲅ̅ⲣ̅ ⲧⲉⲭⲣⲓⲁ ⲧⲏⲣⲥ̅ ⲛⲅ̅ⲛⲟϫⲕ ϫⲉ ⲉⲕⲉⲉⲩⲫⲣⲁⲛⲉ ⲉⲧⲃⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ϫⲓ ⲟⲩⲕⲗⲟⲙ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲉⲩⲧⲥⲁⲛⲟ.
English: And when thou hast done all thy office, take thy place, that thou mayest be merry with them, and receive a crown for thy well ordering of the feast.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲡϩⲗ̅ⲗⲟ ϫⲉ ⲥⲡⲣⲉⲡⲉⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛⲁⲕ: ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲱⲣϫ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲃⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲙⲟⲩⲥⲓⲕⲟⲛ.
English: Speak, thou that art the elder, for it becometh thee, but with sound judgment; and hinder not musick.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲁⲁⲕ ⲛ̅ϩⲁⲛⲥⲁⲃⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲧⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ.
English: Pour not out words where there is a musician, and shew not forth wisdom out of time.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲫⲣⲁⲅⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲁⲛⲑⲣⲁⲝ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩⲕⲟⲥⲙⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲥⲩⲅⲕⲣⲓⲙⲁ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲩⲥⲓⲕⲟⲛ ... ⲟⲩⲥⲩⲙⲡⲟⲇⲓⲟⲛ ⲛ̅ⲏⲣⲡ̅
English: A concert of musick in a banquet of wine is as a signet of carbuncle set in gold.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲥⲫⲣⲁⲅⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲥⲙⲁⲣⲁⲅⲇⲟⲥ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲗ̅ⲗⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲩⲥⲓⲕⲟⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲏⲣⲡ̅ ⲉⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩϥ.
English: As a signet of an emerald set in a work of gold, so is the melody of musick with pleasant wine.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲡϩⲣϣⲓⲣⲉ ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲥⲉⲣ̅ⲭⲣⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲙⲟⲅⲓⲥ ⲉⲩϣⲁⲛ ϫⲛⲟⲩⲕ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲡ ⲥⲛⲁⲩ.
English: Speak, young man, if there be need of thee: and yet scarcely when thou art twice asked.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓ ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲁ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲥⲟⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲧⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲟⲩ.
English: Let thy speech be short, comprehending much in few words; be as one that knoweth and yet holdeth his tongue.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϣⲟϣⲕ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲩⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲗ̅ⲗⲟ.
English: If thou be among great men, make not thyself equal with them; and when ancient men are in place, use not many words.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲛⲉⲃⲣⲏϭⲉ ϥⲱϭⲉ ϩⲁ ⲑⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϩⲣⲟⲩ ⲃ̅ⲃⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲛⲁⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ϩⲁ ⲑⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϣⲡⲓⲏⲧ.
English: Before the thunder goeth lightning; and before a shamefaced man shall go favour.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲱⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲟⲩⲛ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ⲣ̅ϩⲁⲉ: ⲃⲱⲕ ⲉⲡⲉⲕⲏⲓ̈ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ⲱⲥⲕ̅.
English: Rise up betimes, and be not the last; but get thee home without delay.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲅ̅ⲥⲱⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲩ ⲛⲅ̅ⲣ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲕ̅ⲟⲩⲁϣϥ̅ ϣⲁⲧⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ϩⲓ ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧϫⲁⲥⲓϩⲏⲧ
English: There take thy pastime, and do what thou wilt: but sin not by proud speech.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲧⲥⲓⲟ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲛ.
English: And for these things bless him that made thee, and hath replenished thee with his good things.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϣⲁϥϣⲱⲡ ....... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲧϣⲟⲣⲡ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲥⲉⲛⲁϭⲓⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲱϣ.
English: Whoso feareth the Lord will receive his discipline; and they that seek him early shall find favour.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲛⲁⲥⲓ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧϩⲩⲡⲟⲕⲣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ϥⲛⲁⲥⲕⲁⲛⲇⲁⲗⲓⲍⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅.
English: He that seeketh the law shall be filled therewith: but the hypocrite will be offended thereat.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲁϩⲉ ⲉⲫⲁⲡ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲉⲛⲁϫⲉⲣⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲇⲓⲕⲁⲓⲱⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ.
English: They that fear the Lord shall find judgment, and shall kindle justice as a light.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲣⲓⲕⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϫⲡⲓⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ϥⲛⲁϩⲉ ⲉⲡϣⲱϣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲱϣ.
English: A sinful man will not be reproved, but findeth an excuse according to his will.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲟⲃϣϥ̅ ⲉⲩⲙⲟⲕⲙⲉⲕ ⲟⲩϣⲙ̅ⲙⲟ ⲛ̅ϫⲁⲥⲓϩⲏⲧ ⲛⲉϥϣⲡ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲟⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲧⲣⲉϥⲁⲁⲥ ⲛⲉⲙⲁϥ ⲁϫⲛ̅ ϣⲟϫⲛⲉ.
English: A man of counsel will be considerate; but a strange and proud man is not daunted with fear, even when of himself he hath done without counsel.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲁϫⲛ̅ ϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛⲁⲁⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ϩⲧⲏⲕ.
English: Do nothing without advice; and when thou hast once done, repent not.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩϩⲓⲏ ⲛ̅ϩⲧⲟⲡ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲓ ϫⲣⲟⲡ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲱⲛⲉ.
English: Go not in a way wherein thou mayest fall, and stumble not among the stones.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲁⲛϩⲟⲩⲧⲕ̅ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩϩⲓⲏ ⲛ̅ⲁⲧϫⲣⲟⲡ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲉⲡⲉⲕϣⲏⲣⲉ.
English: Be not confident in a plain way. (22) And beware of thine own children.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲛϩⲉⲧ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲱⲃ ⲛⲓⲙ: ⲕⲁⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲛ̅ⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ.
English: In every good work trust thy own soul; for this is the keeping of the commandments.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲡⲓⲥⲧⲉⲩⲉ ⲉⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ϥⲛⲁϯ ϩⲧⲏϥ ⲉⲛⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲉⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ....
English: He that believeth in the Lord taketh heed to the commandment; and he that trusteth in him shall fare never the worse.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁ ⲧⲱⲙⲛ̅ⲧ ⲉⲡⲉϥⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲗⲗⲁ ϥⲛⲁⲣ̅ ⲡⲕⲉⲧⲟⲩϫⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲡⲓⲣⲁⲥⲙⲟⲥ.
English: There shall no evil happen unto him that feareth the Lord; but in temptation even again he will deliver him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲛⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉ ⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲡⲉⲧϩⲩⲡⲟⲕⲣⲓⲛⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϫⲟⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲁⲧⲏⲩ.
English: A wise man hateth not the law; but he that is an hypocrite therein is as a ship in a storm.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲡⲓⲥⲧⲉⲩⲉ ⲉⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲧ ⲛⲁϥ: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲟⲩϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲉϥϫⲱ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ.
English: A man of understanding trusteth in the law; and the law is faithful unto him, as an oracle.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲃ̅ⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲁϫⲉ ⲧⲁⲣⲟⲩⲥⲟⲧⲙⲉϥ: ⲙⲣ̅ ⲧⲉⲕⲥⲃⲱ ⲧⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ.
English: Prepare what to say, and so thou shalt be heard: and bind up instruction, and then make answer.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲟⲧ ⲛⲁϭⲟⲗⲧⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲥⲁⲛ̅ϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲟϭ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲁⲝⲱⲛ ⲉϥⲕⲱⲧⲉ.
English: The heart of the foolish is like a cartwheel; and his thoughts are like a rolling axletree.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲧⲟ ⲉϥϩⲁ ⲟⲩⲕⲁⲣⲟⲩⲭⲓⲟⲛ ⲉϣⲁϥϩⲙ̅ϩⲙ̅ ϩⲁ ⲡⲉⲧϩⲙⲟⲟⲥ ϩⲓϫⲱϥ ⲧⲏⲣϥ̅ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲣ̅ⲣⲉϥⲥⲱⲃⲉ.
English: A stallion horse is as a mocking friend, he neigheth under every one that sitteth upon him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ϩⲟⲟⲩ ϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲓⲣⲏ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲧ ⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ ⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲣⲟⲙⲡⲉ;
English: Why doth one day excel another, when as all the light of every day in the year is of the sun?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲡⲟⲣϫⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲥⲟⲟⲩⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁϥϣⲓⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ.
English: By the knowledge of the Lord they were distinguished: and he altered seasons and feasts.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟⲟⲩ: ⲁϥⲕⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲉϩⲛ̅ⲏⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲟⲩ.
English: Some of them hath he made high days, and hallowed them, and some of them hath he made ordinary days.
